html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-02462023-03-22NR
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of COLETTE BRIN of Québec, Quebec, as a special adviser to the Minister of National Revenue, to serve as Chairperson of the Independent Advisory Board on Eligibility for Journalism Tax Measures, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, on a part-time basis, effective March 24, 2023.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of COLETTE BRIN of Québec, Quebec, as a special adviser to the Minister of National Revenue, to serve as Chairperson of the Independent Advisory Board on Eligibility for Journalism Tax Measures, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, on a part-time basis, effective March 24, 2023.
